plot: A young soldier is fighting for his life in the trenches during World War 1, with results that will effect his life and the life of his friends for ever.
title: No More a Coward Than You or I
plot_es: A young soldier is fighting for his life in the trenches during World War 1, with results that will effect his life and the life of his friends for ever.
original_name: No More a Coward Than You or I
plot_en: A young soldier is fighting for his life in the trenches during World War 1, with results that will effect his life and the life of his friends for ever.
